input.sentences: it was sure to be a busy night on the strip .
all the vendors were expecting a big showing .
the neon lights were shining in all of there glory except the one which flickered continously .
lights were strung crossing the street between the buildings .
the haunted hut was also ready with its own theme for partying .
output.sentences: The strip is usually most busy at night.
Vendors were expecting people to spend a lot of money tonight.
The shining neon lights is what attracts people the most.
The strung street lights hung beautifully.
Every one was already at the theme party.
